website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung Rogue is a great multimedia touch-screen messaging phone for Verizon Wireless customers.
pros: The Samsung Rogue has a gorgeous display, a 3.5mm headset jack, a great keyboard, and an impressive array of features that includes a 3-megapixel camera, EV-DO Rev
A, GPS, and a HTML browser with Flash Lite
It has good call quality as well
cons: The Samsung Rogue is a tad bulky, and the streaming video quality is poor

customer_reviews.title: Is great and looks like new
customer_reviews.text: I buy this phone because i use to have the same before and is pretty good is like the seller say on the post i don't know why has bad reviews for me work perfectly fine come with the wall charger and plastic to protect the screen i haven't see any scratch is like new i'm very happy with my purchase, i didn't have any problem with the activation i call Verizon wireless and they help me that was easy i check everything on the settings and tools and is all good and best is,you don't need those high cost data plans from Verizon great phone buy one and enjoyed thank you Neo's phone store.
customer_reviews.author: Vegas052Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Questionable
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about this phone. I have clear evidence that I have not received some text messages, but maybe that’s not the phone. However, I did not have a problem with the old phone. Also,I have to charge the phone every evening, and that’s after only 2 or 3 calls and 15 texts. I’ll give it a few days to see if there is more to be concerned about.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product
customer_reviews.text: Received the phone in apparent good condition but battery would not hold a charge. Contacted them and they shipped a new battery out without any problems. Unfortunately that battery was faulty as well. I attempted to trouble shoot the problem on my own by replacing the battery and chargers with OEM parts but it still would not hold a charge. I contact them to advise but they refused to do anything stating I am by far past the 90 day warranty (I was over by a few weeks) and they couldn't be sure I did not damage it even though I had already made a charging issue complaint with the company. They do not stand by the products they sell.
customer_reviews.author: Jared D Loucks

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: Downgrading from a smart phone to this, I'm going to feel the loss, however, it does the job. Minor, annoying things, like the screen won't stay in during a call so that you can mash numbers (as is pretty standard for calls to anything but a friend these days), and the flash on the camera doesn't work... If I take away my spoiled rotten, it's actually a good phone and serves the purpose I purchased it for. Timely delivery. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: So kalohe

customer_reviews.title: Love it! <3
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this phone so far! I got it to replace my LG Cosmos Touch which had already been replaced 3 times in the 12 months i'd had it (warranty finally ran out). I had to activate the 75MB data ($9.95/mo), but it's totally worth it! Granted, the phone is 3 years out of style, but it works like a gem. The absolute ONLY reason why I am taking one star is because the browsing is rather confusing to figure out. And who knows, maybe that's just me.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael P

customer_reviews.title: Sold a phone that doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I was sold a phone that doesn't charge and Verizon cannot turn it on. The seller has not responded to my request to return the item.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela J Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: out of date
customer_reviews.text: I went to the Verizon store and they couldn't give me a no contract plan with this phone. To be completely honest it is the Verizon programs that I didn't like because it made the phone too expensive to use. There are much better options available.
customer_reviews.author: Eve K

customer_reviews.title: Older becomes new again!!
customer_reviews.text: I stressed waiting for this phone to arrive. It's replaced an updated model (the Samsung Reality), but so far I like this way better. There's a flash, so the pics are better, and texting is so easy. The condition of this phone is almost pristine, a great bonus!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli McClain

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Rogue
customer_reviews.text: Well...when i bought this phone, It kept shutting off when you close the keyboard. Didn't pay no mind to it at first. Then it got to where it would not come on at all. Didn't even have it a month. Who ever had this phone didn't take care of it. Not very honest in your ad. won't buy from you again. Amazon marketplace keeps this up, I won't buy from any of it other than amazon itself. People need to get their ads state with what they are selling and be honest. Why rune a good site like amazon with the junk that people want to sell and pass off as a good item on the marketplace.
customer_reviews.author: Kahle L. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: think be for buying  used always
customer_reviews.text: When i first got my rogue other people had trouble hearing me thought it was there phone but after 2 weeks of it people could not here me at all plus the phone charger was not good had to buy new charger also, So I went out to radio shack pick out a new phone out for 49.95 with a 2 year contract and now i should be all set first time buying off amazon like this I bet its my last time used phone 65.00 new charger 10 bucks spent 75.00 new phone with new charger 49.00 u do the math
customer_reviews.author: perry

customer_reviews.title: Data Not Needed
customer_reviews.text: For a basic phone, this is perfect. Doesn't require data, so the price is definitely right.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: THE FIRST AWFUL EXPERIENCE I HAVE EVER HAD ON AMAZON
customer_reviews.text: Awful service along with an awful phone. The phone was all scratched up, and was not functional. It kept turning off by itself and the touchscreen was horrible to use. The seller also did not reply to TWO of my emails, so I wasn't really happy about that either. Overall I had horrible service and I'm not happy to write about a bad review. Hope to get my refund soon.
customer_reviews.author: Dina C

customer_reviews.title: Simple Phone.
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a simple, reasonably priced phone that was easy to text on, this phone does all that and at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: MMagee

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Touch Screen
customer_reviews.text: The touchscreen did not work at all when I first got the phone. The screen did work for a short time before malfunctioning again. The supplier is sending me a new phone so maybe this one will actually work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast response
customer_reviews.text: Had an issue with phone that Joe was quick to correct. Very nice to work with and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Beaver Brownlee

customer_reviews.title: Basic Phone +++++++
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent basic phone+. Easy to use and many extra features not typically found on a phone in the price range.
customer_reviews.author: Karen A. Dewitt

customer_reviews.title: NOT fully tested.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone from PROFLIPUSA. Description said the phone was fully tested and 100% functional. Phone turned on but touch screen was inoperable.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Defective peice of crap.
customer_reviews.text: Had the phone for less than a day and the touchscreen keeps freezing, the actual keypad doesn't work properly, and it wont even charge right. Like seriously I don't appreciate getting sent defective merchandise. So I am returning the phone and I will be taking my business elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: antarcher13

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Wanted!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone from MobileSpree and it is awesome!! I have no complaints on the phone whatsoever it is exactly how I imagined :). Definitely would buy from MobileSpree again!!
customer_reviews.author: BGo2

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: i really didn't like the phone it really didn't meat my expectations
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: appears good
customer_reviews.text: very good phone for the price.....slight scratch but seems to be as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Bohlman

customer_reviews.title: great simple phone
customer_reviews.text: everywhere only wants to show u a smartphone, and all i want is a phone with a keyboard and no data. great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M Wadsworth

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It was broken when it shipped. Didn't work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Twice broken
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these and both broke just after the warranty period. I bought one from JustCellular and they refused to help. I would not buy another one of these phones nor would I ever deal with JustCellular again.
customer_reviews.author: seankels

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED!!!
customer_reviews.text: great looking and everything BUT the one i got was defective -.- when i slide up the screen to use the QWERTY keybaord the keys P(/),M(?), the left arrow key do not work. i am ver sad about that and when i want to use those keys i have to close my phone and use the touch screen then slide it back up agian to continue using it. VERY ANNOYING. someimes restarts randomly. this is the last time i buy a cellphone on amamzon.
customer_reviews.author: YFG

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Phone.
customer_reviews.text: The retailer send me a random GSM ATT phone, of which would not work on the Verizon CDMA network. 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando Ching

customer_reviews.title: Phone won't charge.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bought this phone and loved it.......for a week. After that, it wouldn't charge. We bought new cords, new batteries but nothing helped. We even bought a used rogue to use as a charger but even that one won't charge. Save your money and buy a different phone.
customer_reviews.author: tdslayer

customer_reviews.title: Bad phone
customer_reviews.text: works ok, but now I'm having trouble with receiving complete messages and it doesn't tell me I have voicemail. It used to show how many messages I had, now it doesn't. Can't find a decent plain phone for work purposes that doesn't need data.
customer_reviews.author: Liz M

customer_reviews.title: I wish I could give a better review as I bought this for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give a better review as I bought this for my daughter. However there is a reason I buy cheap used basic phones because she goes through phones like they are socks! However while she had this phone, it seemed like a decent phone!
customer_reviews.author: Shane Mills

customer_reviews.title: samsung rouge
customer_reviews.text: this phone works great, its easy to use and perfect for texting, naviagting the web, and is equipit with a great cmaera and lots of features. i would recomended
customer_reviews.author: kweiss

customer_reviews.title: Cant belive how these phones look
customer_reviews.text: These phone are all use up its paint miss from both phone one of the cell phone have a big scratch on the front screen of it.I CAN NOT BELIVE HE PUT THAT THESE PHONE WERE SATISFACTION no way I am so mad
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: WORKED FOR A WEEK!!!!
customer_reviews.text: GOT THIS AND IT WORKED FOR A WEEK HAD A TON OF SCRATCHES ON SCREEN AND YOU COULD TELL IT HAD BEEN DOPED ALOT! AND WHEN I GOT IT IT DIDNT HAVE THE CHARGER WITH IT!!!! DO NOT BUY THIS PHONE OFF THEM UNLESS YOU WANT TO WAIST YOU MONEY.... I DID THE REFUND AND NOW I HAVE TO WAIT UP TO 4 WEEKS TO GET MY MONEY I PAYED THAT THEY RECEIVED THAT DAY!!!!!!! VERY DISPLEASED. **** ID GIVE IT 0 STARS BUT I CANT****
customer_reviews.author: Ruth3677

customer_reviews.title: Used Samsung Rogue was in pretty good shape
customer_reviews.text: Used Samsung Rogue was in pretty good shape. The screen had a fleck of something (don't want to know what it was) that was easily cleaned off, so there's no excuse for it being sent out that way. I ordered it as a replacement for my old Rogue, which no longer had a functional touch screen. Touch screen on this one is fine... everything seems to work, except adjusting the sound volume for specific alerts... I decided to go ahead and take advantage of a good offer on a smartphone, but I'm keeping this as a user friendly phone for an elderly relative.
customer_reviews.author: L. Packard

customer_reviews.title: The service from the seller was very good. The phone itself
customer_reviews.text: The service from the seller was very good. The phone itself, I was looking for a very easy to text phone - I am older and seems my fingers easily hit more than one key at a time. This phone didn't work for me - still hard to text on it.
customer_reviews.author: GA

customer_reviews.title: Decent phone, great seller (BSR Cellular)
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone from bsr cellular. They allowed me to swap out a phone I wasn't completely satisfied with for free. The phone does its job. I've also had an LG envy touch. I like the Envy touch just a little better. The main dissapointment is the use of a proprietary coard and lack of support for this device in bit pim. For those reasons I will switch back to the LG once this wears out.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I really like this phone! It's just that it's an older phone, so it's kinda out of date. The touchscreen is sorta hard to press at first, especially compared to modern smartphones. But after a while of use it's not bad! The thing I dislike the most about it is that it does not have T9word for the QWERTY board, which I like to use as an autocorrect, and it does not automatically capitalize "I" or other proper nouns/names. The keyboard on the touchscreen is in ABC form, not QWERTY form like on most touchscreens. But overall, I really like this phone and would recommend it to anyone who wants a touchscreen but isn't looking for a smartphone!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Good Phone
customer_reviews.text: This is a good, reliable phone with just enough capability to be very useful but not so many bells & whistles that you're overwhelmed. I'm an older person who wanted a replacement for the Rogue my daughter got me, since I accidentally dropped it in the toilet-true story! I have become quite good at operating it. It's not a smartphone but I can get online if absolutely necessary. It doesn't tempt me to be on it doing everything all day and all night long. It doesn't enslave me!
customer_reviews.author: Postulant

customer_reviews.title: not a good phone
customer_reviews.text: Well customer service was great with my refund but the phone was not so good. the battery drained and so i charged it and it had the charging screen on but the phone never came back on and so Iwas very disappointed but ,I told customer service what happened and then they issued me a full refund. so if you buy this phone watch it very carefully cause you only have 30 days to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda is an Amazon Cunsumer

customer_reviews.title: This phone was awful to use
customer_reviews.text: The back on the device was impossible to slide off and on. Maybe it was just that phone but the rest of the design wasn't any better. There were so many "too sensitive" buttons on the sides that it made handling the device too difficult. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Raemo

customer_reviews.title: Okay Phone, not in perfect shape, but not too beat up
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect a perfect used phone. It had a couple scratches but this phone falls out of your hand easily. So all and all I'd say its in pretty good shape. The phone is cool itself, mine can't seem to connect to the internet but that's alright. All and all 3/5
customer_reviews.author: Rick NeJame

customer_reviews.title: hpne was new condition. thanks fast shipping...
customer_reviews.text: Item was in the condition it was promoted to be in before purchase. This phone works great. I bought the phone to use with page plus before I found out that they dont recommend bringing a Verizon phone over that has never been setup on the verizon service because it will cause you not to be able to use some of the functions of the phone. I cannot use any of the apps on the phone due to this issue. Just a heads up to people moving to Page Plus.
customer_reviews.author: russwess

customer_reviews.title: Great little phone. Love that data plan is not required. Teens do not need smart phones.
customer_reviews.text: Good reliable phone. Works as advertised. Nice to find a reliable phone that is not required to have a data plan.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wood

customer_reviews.title: I don't know.
customer_reviews.text: The phone was advertised as new. When it came. It looked OK, not new, but looked packaged well. When we plugged it in there was no response from the phone. We couldn't even charge it up. The company did treat me well though. I was able to get my card refunded and when I complained about paying the postage for its return they even paid for the return postage.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Carroll

customer_reviews.title: I really love this phone that's why I keep buying another one
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Samsung Rogue, I really love this phone that's why I keep buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: Gina R. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Never gone Rougue on me.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this phone for 5 years now and it performs flawlessly. Best non smartphone I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: DavidRayRob

customer_reviews.title: phone worked really well i love this kind of phone its easy to use i ...
customer_reviews.text: phone worked really well i love this kind of phone its easy to use i dont like the complicated phones
customer_reviews.author: jemmy lovery

customer_reviews.title: samsung rogue
customer_reviews.text: i bought this phone as a gift and she seems to really like it except for the battery life which stinks
customer_reviews.author: bjbass22

customer_reviews.title: the touch screen would not work after about 1 month ...
customer_reviews.text: the touch screen would not work after about 1 month asked for a return but never heard from the company
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Just what she wanted
customer_reviews.text: Phone works well, no complaints. It is nice to be able to buy these from amazon as Verizon only sells crappy basic phones now. I have also saved money as I no longer pay for the insurance every month, because I know I can just go on amazon and find a phone that is better, and costs only as much as the deductible. Texting is great, with no problems, and gets a massive work out as this is my 13 year olds phone. Camera works well.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Came in awful condition, all chipped and trashy looking. The calibration is soo off I can hardly use it anymore
customer_reviews.author: W.J.P.

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer!
customer_reviews.text: Happy Customer! The Samsung rogue is a Nice size phone and user-friendly. Just as described. Would recommend to others. Shipped out real quick!
customer_reviews.author: TrT

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This was for our son and he loves it. He especially likes the touch screen along with the flip out keypad. We've only had it since Christmas but so far, so good. We did have trouble syncing his contacts. Haven't figured that one out yet.
customer_reviews.author: J.W.

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh..
customer_reviews.text: Mine freezes alot and the screen cracked within the first 2 weeks and it wasnt even my falt it fell 6 inches and cracked the whole screen. Overall its an ok phone. good for texting
customer_reviews.author: Blake Bashaw

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: There was a small ding on the screen and a scratch on the side, but besides that the phone looked great. The only problem i've had with it so far is the battery life. it isnt as good as my old new rogue but i guess i cant really complain since everything else is functioning well.
customer_reviews.author: sparky

product_meta.title: Samsung Rogue U960 CDMA phone for Verizon Wireless Network with No Contract
product_meta.description: A sleek messaging phone with a full touchscreen display, it is complemented with a horizontal slide-out, QWERTY keyboard. It also includes threaded messaging capabilities - one-touch access to social networking sites including Facebook, MySpace, Twitter, YouTube and Photobucket. Compatible with the V Cast Music with Rhapsody service, which enables you to purchase songs through your phone and download them via the fast Verizon Wireless 3G EV-DO data network, You'll also stay on course thanks to the VZ Navigator GPS turn-by-turn direction service. Other features include a 3-megapixel camera with video capture capabilities, Bluetooth connectivity for hands-free devices and stereo music streaming, microSD memory expansion to 16 GB, full range of messaging options including email and instant messaging, bi-lingual interface (English and Spanish). This device may require a data plan for activation. Please, contact your phone carrier for details.
feature_bullets: 3G-enabled quick messaging phone with 2.8-inch customizable touchscreen display and side-sliding QWERTY keyboard
Bluetooth Connectivity - Take your talking to the next level with a Bluetooth wireless headset.
2.0-megapixel camera/camcorder; Bluetooth stereo music; microSD memory expansion to 16 GB; organizer tools; personal and work e-mail
Clear ESN , Ready To Activate, No Contract Required

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars94 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
